built_in_tools.name: codebase_search
built_in_tools.description: Semantic search tool for finding code snippets
built_in_tools.what_it_does: Finds relevant code based on natural language queries
built_in_tools.how_to_use: Provide search query and optional target directories

built_in_tools.name: read_file
built_in_tools.description: Read file contents with line range support
built_in_tools.what_it_does: Reads and displays file contents with context
built_in_tools.how_to_use: Specify file path and line ranges

built_in_tools.name: edit_file
built_in_tools.description: Edit existing files or create new ones
built_in_tools.what_it_does: Makes precise edits to files with context preservation
built_in_tools.how_to_use: Provide target file, instructions, and code changes

built_in_tools.name: grep_search
built_in_tools.what_it_does: Finds exact text patterns using regex
built_in_tools.how_to_use: Provide regex pattern and optional file filters

built_in_tools.name: run_terminal_cmd
built_in_tools.how_to_use: Provide command string and background flag

mcp_tools.name: memory_palace_tools
mcp_tools.what_it_is: Persistent knowledge storage and retrieval system
mcp_tools.what_it_does: Stores, queries, and reflects on project knowledge
mcp_tools.how_to_use: Initialize workspace, update with learnings, query for insights

user_resources.name: mentalmodels.md
user_resources.what_it_does: Defines 54 mental models with implementation status
user_resources.how_to_use: Reference for implementation requirements and priorities
relevant_for: Understanding what needs to be implemented

user_resources.name: panda_mcp_codebase
user_resources.what_it_does: Provides core planning functionality with mental models
